title: Mooti: child of New India
creator_credit: J. Michael Hagopian and Atlantis Productions
brief_description: The story of a Hindu village boy who plays a part in a changing India. Through Mooti’s eyes are presented the three major concepts of the film: change to new tools, change to new industries, change to new relationships.
